title: Channelling passion for the ocean towards plastic pollution
body: Metrics. Plastic pollution is caused exclusively by humans. It poses growing global threats to both the ocean and society, and requires urgent action. Using psychological principles can motivate ...

- Ocean pollution and the role of human behavior
The text discusses the impact of plastic pollution on oceans and society. It emphasizes the urgent need for action and highlights the connection between human behavior and the accumulation of plastic in the natural environment. The role of behavioral sciences in addressing ocean plastic pollution is also underscored.
summary:
The post discusses the impact of plastic pollution on oceans and society, emphasizing the urgent need for action and the role of human behavior in the accumulation of plastic in the natural environment. The text conveys a sense of concern and emphasizes the importance of addressing ocean plastic pollution. 

Sentiment: 0.8
